settings.editor: Although it can be challenging to beat the heat while still maintaining an appropriate appearance for the office, there are some excellent outfit choices for summer business casual attire. In particular, looks that feature light colors and garments in light and breathable materials, such as cotton, linen, and silk, are ideal for warm weather. Also, dresses and skirts can be useful for keeping your legs cool but remember to avoid overly tight styles that can generate heat.
